name: This Little Piggy
description:
Welcome to your new life as a space hermit. This little planet is all yours - what should you do next? Maybe you should make a Potato Salad...

  • Mouse to look around.
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Shift to Run.
  • Space to Jump
  • F to collect items
  • R to Reload
  • Mouse click to use current equipment.
  • Esc to Unhide cursor in web build.

Game made by:
Daniel Nascimento @DanielSound - Art
Sebastian Lague @SebastianLague - Code
Thiago Adamo - PXLDJ @Thiagotd - Audio

You can listen to the awesome original soundtrack made for this game by Thiago Adamo over here:
https://soundcloud.com/pxldj/sets/this-little-pig-ost-ld48-ludum-dare
Or check an Art Timelapse video of the game here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jpgjoBiH9y0
Or check the audio behind scenes: http://youtu.be/owZwY9PT7mE?a

This game was featured on Rock, Paper, Shotgun: http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2014/09/10/freeware-garden-this-little-piggy/
